title: Where is the server transferring tool ?
body:
Hi everyone !

I just got back to France after a 6 months stay in the US, and I was wondering were is now the tool to transfer my account from NA to EUW. I used to buy my previous transfer in the client store, but I don't see it anywhere anymore.

Thank you !

replies.body:
You can find it under the *Account* section in the store. It's the little button in the top right of the store. I've provided some screenshots below to assist you.

**Click to Enlarge**

https://imgur.com/a/dkjtt

Let me know if you have any questions.

http://i.imgur.com/K6dn0ei.png
i'm not seeing anything about changing regions here
That's because you're running the Alpha Client. That functionality hasn't been brought over to this client yet, so I recommend transferring regions in the normal (air) client.
